io.bretty.console.view

Class MenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.bretty.console.view.AbstractView
      • io.bretty.console.view.MenuView

  • public class MenuView
extends AbstractView
    The View that displays a list of options with index numbers, and asks the user to select one to proceed. It provides validation of user input.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<AbstractView> menuItems
      a list of AbstractView objects to be displayed in the menu as available options
